channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Flooded every year with many trip a d slip hazards, 27th January
item.description:
Hello lewisham I have reported this issue many times over the years , needs probably 50k plus to sort out the whole surface and drainage issue along the whole of Clyde Terrace , folk will slip and get hurt ! Not sure Lewisham's not bothered ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Longfield Crescent, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
